Allele

Displaying alleles of the specified position.

  • sample

    TSE000086, LC2/ad required

    Example name or ID

  • chromosome

    1 required

    Chromosome number

  • position

    10234 required

    Allele position

<togostanza-allele sample="LC2/ad" chromosome="1" position="10234"></togostanza-allele>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
